TextEng: Grovelling won't save your worthless hide! Die!
Text: 빌어봤자 그 하찮은 목숨 못 구해! 죽어!

TextEng: Answer my questions, then.
Me still kill you! You die now!
Text: 나 여전히 죽일 거야! 이제 죽어!

TextEng: You answer me question me let you live, maybe.
Where is Maugrim?
Where be Maugrim?
What does this cult want? Why are they doing all this?
Text: 사교가 원하는 게 뭐야? 왜 이런 짓을 하는 거지?

TextEng: What cult want? Why they do this?
Tell me what you know.
You talk, now.
Fine, I want to ask you something else.
Okay, me want ask other stuff.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Your life is in my hands. You had best tell me all you know.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 네 목숨은 내 손에 달렸어. 아는 거 다 말하는 게 좋을 거야.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You life in me hands. You no keep secret...
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 네 목숨 내 손에 있어. 비밀 숨기지 마...

TextEng: Either you start talking or I start removing your fingers!
You talk or me hack off you fingers!
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> You needn't fear reprisal from Maugrim. I intend to kill him.
Text: <StartCheck>[통찰]</Start> 모그림의 보복은 걱정 안 해도 돼. 그를 죽일 생각이니까.

TextEng: I want more information on the cult.
Me wants to know more 'bout cult.
Go on... run, and don't come back.
Go, wizard. You run and not comes back!
Text: 가, 마법사. 도망쳐. 다시 오지 마!

TextEng: Give me everything of worth you have, wizard.
Text: 가진 것 중 값어치 있는 건 다 내놔, 마법사.

TextEng: You gives me all good stuff you has, wizard.
I have questions I want answered, first.
Me has questions, first.
I do not trust you, wizard.
Me not trusts you, wizard.
You'd lie and more to save your skin. Forget it!
You lies! No deal!!
Tell me who you are.
Tell me who you is.
I don't have any more questions.
Me has no more questions.
And what are you doing here now, then?
Text: 그럼 지금 여기서 뭘 하고 있는 거야?

TextEng: Who is this Arklem?
Who was Arklem overthrown by?
What you do here now?
Who Arklem?
Who Arklem overthrown by?
I want to know something else.
Me wants to know something else.
Tell me more about Maugrim.
Why would he need an army?
Tell me more 'bout Maugrim.
Why he needs army?
Just how did the cult manage to take over?
Just how cult takes tower over?
Who are his supporters?
Who he gots with him?
Why would he need an army?
Why he needs army?
Are you telling me everything you know?
Text: 아는 거 다 말하고 있는 거야?

TextEng: You tells me all you knows?
You are lying. You know more than you're saying.
Text: 거짓말하고 있어. 말한 것보다 더 알잖아.

TextEng: You lies. You knows more than you says.
I knew it! You are lying to me! Time to die!!
Text: 그럴 줄 알았어! 거짓말이었구나! 이제 죽어!!

TextEng: Me knows! You lies still!! You die now!!
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Are you sure you don't want to tell me more?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 정말로 더 말하고 싶지 않은 거야?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You is sure you not wants to say more?
I despise people who lie to me. I would have to hurt them.
Me hates liars. Me hurts liars, you knows.
Text: 나 거짓말쟁이 싫어. 아프게 해, 알지?

TextEng: Fine. Then I guess I'll have to kill you.
Okay. Me just kills you, then.
Aribeth?
When Maugrim comes here?
When did Maugrim arrive?
